title: Karnataka announces new rules for installation of EV chargers in apartments and high-rises
description: Karnataka Electricity Regulatory Commission (KERC) streamlined the installation process for EV-charging stations in high-rises and large apartment buildings. KERC directed electricity supply companies and the energy department to simplify procedures and implement safety regulations. The new guidelines aimed to mitigate installation challenges faced by flat owners, consumers, and residents' welfare associations (RWAs).
